_source.text: A few points of clarification - 1) ML yearbooks are filled with slugging, no-field 1B (Dick Stuart, Dave Kingman, Jason Giambi, etc.); 2) DaMeat is actually better than Dunn as a 1B, in terms of career numbers; 3) Guzman will not hit 20 HR in the NL, unless he's traded to COL or develops an undercut swing; 4) Olsen is hardly an "Ace", but will probably battle Lannan for the OD assignment.
